articles.author: Shamim Chowdhury
articles.title: Bangladesh's ousted prime minister sentenced to death for role in protest crackdown - NPR
articles.description: A tribunal in Dhaka sentenced Sheikh Hasina to death for her involvement in the use of deadly force against protesters last year. She fled to India and was sentenced in absentia.
articles.content: A court in Bangladesh sentenced ousted Bangladeshi Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina to death for crimes against humanity on Monday, for her role in a crackdown on last year's student-led uprising which t… [+4223 chars]

articles.author: Emily Mae  Czachor
articles.title: Indiana homeowner charged in shooting death of house cleaner who showed up at wrong address - CBS News
articles.description: An Indiana prosecutor has charged a homeowner who shot and killed a house cleaner earlier this month, when she showed up at his property by mistake.
articles.content: An Indiana homeowner is being charged with a felony after he shot and killed a house cleaner on his front porch earlier this month. Police said the woman and her husband had mistakenly shown up to th… [+4278 chars]
